code: import{useContext}from'react';import{CurrentUserContext}from'../contexts/CurrentUserContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Card(_ref){var card=_ref.card,onOpenImage=_ref.onOpenImage,onCardClick=_ref.onCardClick,onCardDeletePopupOpen=_ref.onCardDeletePopupOpen,onCardLike=_ref.onCardLike,onCardDelete=_ref.onCardDelete;var currentUser=useContext(CurrentUserContext);var isOwn=card.owner._id===currentUser._id;var isLiked=card.likes.some(function(i){return i._id===currentUser._id;});var cardDeleteButtonClassName="card__delete ".concat(isOwn&&'show-block');var cardLikeButtonClassName="card__like ".concat(isLiked&&'card__like_active');function handleClick(){onOpenImage();onCardClick(card);}function handleClickLike(){onCardLike(card);}function handleClickDelete(){onCardDeletePopupOpen(card);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleClickDelete,className:cardDeleteButtonClassName,type:"button"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{onClick:handleClick,className:"card__img",alt:card.name,src:card.link}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card__description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"card__title",children:card.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card__container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:cardLikeButtonClassName,type:"button",onClick:handleClickLike}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"card__like-count",children:card.likes.length})]})]})]});}
